data.name: Project Sparrow
data.detailed_description:
Fight alone or along side your allies in this arena based PvP archery game, created solely by Dids. Focusing primarily on fast paced arena gameplay, providing the game with a perfect place for balance and iteration before exploring additional mechanics and gamemodes.

ENTER THE ARENA

Fight alone or with your allies through multiple arenas and gamemodes. Take aim in a Duel, fight alongside your allies in 2v2 and 3v3, or boot up a deathmatch for some practise.

YOUR PLAYSTYLE

Every round, players can choose between multiple arrows types and utility equipment. Appear behind your enemies with the shadow arrow, deny areas with fire arrows or cover up openings with smoke.

TRAINING AND TRIALS

Perfect your aim in the training range, providing different target types against AI and Bots, or enter the Infinity Trials and perfect your time against everyone else in the world.

DEDICATED SERVERS AND PLAYER COUNT

Please note queue times for matchmaking may be long, please use the Discord server if you are struggling to find a game. Dedicated server region availability is currently only supported in the following regions, more regions will be available soon.


  • EU-CENTRAL (Frankfurt)
  • US-EAST (Ohio)
  • US-WEST (California)
  • AP-SOUTHEAST (Sydney)
  • AP-NORTHEAST (Japan)
  • SA-EAST (São Paulo)
  • AP-SOUTEAST-1 (Singapore)
  • ME-SOUTH-1 (Bahrain)

CUSTOM GAMES AND SPECTATING

Fire up a custom lobby with your friends, or setup tournament games. Up to 4 spectators are allowed in all customs games, spectator keybinds can be find in the input menu.

data.short_description: Awaken the archer within. Experience responsive third-person archery combat and defeat your opponents in competitive arena-based PvP combat.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 / AMD R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core from Intel or AMd at 2.8GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
